001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client;
003
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.net.URI;
007import java.time.Duration;
008import java.util.*;
009import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
010import java.util.concurrent.ForkJoinPool;
011import java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService;
012import java.util.function.Function;
013import java.util.function.Predicate;
014import java.util.function.Supplier;
015
016import javax.annotation.Nullable;
017
018import dev.failsafe.spi.Scheduler;
019
020import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.HttpExceptionFactory;
021import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.*;
022import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.*;
023
024import org.apache.commons.lang3.SystemUtils;
025import org.slf4j.event.Level;
026
027/**
028    <p>The ClientBuilder is used to configure and create an {@link ApiHttpClient}. As the ApiHttpClient uses a {@link HandlerStack stack}
029    of middlewares the Builder comes with methods to configure and attach new middlewares. Also it ensures that some default
030    used middlewares are instantiated at the correct location in the middleware stack.</p>
031
032    <p>The default middlewares and services are added as Supplier to be able to override the ones provided by e.g.: {@link #defaultClient(URI)}</p>
033 */
034public class ClientBuilder implements Builder<ApiHttpClient> {
035    public static final String COMMERCETOOLS = "commercetools";
036    static final String userAgent = "commercetools-sdk-java-v2/";
037
038    private URI apiBaseUrl;
039    private boolean useAuthCircuitBreaker;
040    private int authRetries;
041    private Supplier<ErrorMiddleware> errorMiddleware;
042    private Supplier<OAuthMiddleware> oAuthMiddleware;
043    private Supplier<RetryRequestMiddleware> retryMiddleware;
044    private Supplier<QueueRequestMiddleware> queueMiddleware;
045    private Supplier<Middleware> correlationIdMiddleware;
046    private InternalLoggerMiddleware internalLoggerMiddleware;
047    private UserAgentMiddleware userAgentMiddleware;
048    private List<Middleware> middlewares = new ArrayList<>();
049    private Supplier<HandlerStack> stack;
050    private VrapHttpClient httpClient;
051    private VrapHttpClient oauthHttpClient;
052    private Supplier<ResponseSerializer> serializer;
053    private Supplier<HttpExceptionFactory> httpExceptionFactory;
054
055    private Supplier<ExecutorService> oauthExecutorService = ForkJoinPool::new;
056    /**
057     * <p>Creates a default client builder</p>
058     * @return ClientBuilder instance
059     */
060    public static ClientBuilder of() {
061        return new ClientBuilder();
062    }
063
064    public static ClientBuilder of(ExecutorService httpClientExecutorService) {
065        return new ClientBuilder(httpClientExecutorService);
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specific or preconfigured {@link VrapHttpClient} instance. Uses defaults for
070     * the {@link HandlerStack}</p>
071     * @param httpClient the HTTP client to be used
072     * @return ClientBuilder instance
073     */
074    public static ClientBuilder of(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
075        return new ClientBuilder(httpClient);
076    }
077
078    /**
079     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specific or preconfigured {@link ApiHttpClient} instance. Uses defaults for
080     * the {@link HandlerStack}</p>
081     * @param httpClient the HTTP client to be used
082     * @return ClientBuilder instance
083     */
084    public static ClientBuilder of(final ApiHttpClient httpClient) {
085        return new ClientBuilder(httpClient);
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specifig {@link HandlerStack}</p>
090     * @param stack the HandlerStack to be used
091     * @return ClientBuilder instance
092     */
093    public static ClientBuilder of(final HandlerStack stack) {
094        return new ClientBuilder(stack);
095    }
096
097    private ClientBuilder(final HandlerStack stack) {
098        this.stack = () -> stack;
099        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
100        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
101        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
102        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
103        this.authRetries = 1;
104    }
105
106    private ClientBuilder() {
107        this.httpClient = HttpClientSupplier.of(new ForkJoinPool()).get();
108        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
109        this.stack = stackSupplier();
110        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
111        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
112        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
113        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
114        this.authRetries = 1;
115    }
116
117    private ClientBuilder(ExecutorService httpClientExecutorService) {
118        this.httpClient = HttpClientSupplier.of(httpClientExecutorService).get();
119        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
120        this.stack = stackSupplier();
121        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
122        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
123        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
124        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
125        this.authRetries = 1;
126    }
127
128    private ClientBuilder(final ApiHttpClient httpClient) {
129        this.httpClient = httpClient;
130        this.oauthHttpClient = HttpClientSupplier.of(new ForkJoinPool()).get();
131        this.stack = stackSupplier();
132        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
133        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
134        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
135        this.authRetries = 1;
136    }
137
138    private ClientBuilder(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
139        this.httpClient = httpClient;
140        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
141        this.stack = stackSupplier();
142        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
143        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
144        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
145        this.authRetries = 1;
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * Ensures the order of default middlewares to create a {@link HandlerStack}
150     * @return HandlerStack supplier method
151     */
152    private Supplier<HandlerStack> stackSupplier() {
153        return () -> {
154            final List<Middleware> middlewareStack = new ArrayList<>();
155            Optional.ofNullable(errorMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
156            Optional.ofNullable(internalLoggerMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
157            Optional.ofNullable(userAgentMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
158            Optional.ofNullable(oAuthMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
159            Optional.ofNullable(retryMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
160            Optional.ofNullable(queueMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
161            Optional.ofNullable(correlationIdMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
162            middlewareStack.addAll(middlewares);
163            return HandlerStack.create(HttpHandler.create(requireNonNull(httpClient)), middlewareStack);
164        };
165    }
166
167    /**
168     * Ensures the order of default middlewares to create a {@link HandlerStack}
169     * @return HandlerStack supplier method
170     */
171    private Supplier<HandlerStack> oauthHandlerSupplier() {
172        return () -> {
173            final List<Middleware> middlewareStack = new ArrayList<>();
174            Optional.ofNullable(userAgentMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
175            Optional.ofNullable(correlationIdMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
176            return HandlerStack.create(HttpHandler.create(requireNonNull(oauthHttpClient)), middlewareStack);
177        };
178    }
179
180    public ClientBuilder withoutAuthCircuitBreaker() {
181        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = false;
182        return this;
183    }
184
185    public ClientBuilder withAuthCircuitBreaker() {
186        this.useAuthCircuitBreaker = true;
187        return this;
188    }
189
190    public ClientBuilder withAuthRetries(final int authRetries) {
191        this.authRetries = authRetries;
192        return this;
193    }
194
195    public ClientBuilder withHandlerStack(final HandlerStack stack) {
196        this.stack = () -> stack;
197        return this;
198    }
199
200    public ClientBuilder withHttpClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
201        this.httpClient = httpClient;
202        return this;
203    }
204
205    public ClientBuilder withOAuthHttpClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
206        this.oauthHttpClient = httpClient;
207        return this;
208    }
209
210    public ClientBuilder withSerializer(final ResponseSerializer serializer) {
211        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
212        return this;
213    }
214
215    public ClientBuilder withSerializer(final Supplier<ResponseSerializer> serializer) {
216        this.serializer = serializer;
217        return this;
218    }
219
220    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final HttpExceptionFactory factory) {
221        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> factory;
222        return this;
223    }
224
225    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Function<ResponseSerializer, HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
226        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> factory.apply(serializer.get());
227        return this;
228    }
229
230    /**
231     * configures the Factory for HTTP exception in case.
232     * @param factory
233     * @return
234     */
235    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Supplier<HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
236        this.httpExceptionFactory = factory;
237        return this;
238    }
239
240    /**
241     * configures an ExecutorService to be used for the Middlewares
242     * @param executorService supplier of the executor service to be used
243     * @return
244     */
245    public ClientBuilder withOAuthExecutorService(final Supplier<ExecutorService> executorService) {
246        this.oauthExecutorService = executorService;
247        return this;
248    }
249
250    /**
251     * configures an ExecutorService to be used for the Middlewares
252     * @param executorService executor service to be used
253     * @return ClientBuilder instance
254     */
255    public ClientBuilder withOAuthExecutorService(final ExecutorService executorService) {
256        this.oauthExecutorService = () -> executorService;
257        return this;
258    }
259
260    /**
261     * <p>Configures a client with the default middlewares and the given baseUrl</p>
262     * <p>The following middlewares and services are configured:
263     * <ul>
264     *     <li>{@link ErrorMiddleware}</li>
265     *     <li>{@link ResponseSerializer}</li>
266     *     <li>{@link InternalLoggerFactory}</li>
267     *     <li>{@link UserAgentMiddleware}</li>
268     *     <li>{@link AcceptGZipMiddleware}</li>
269     * </ul>
270     * </p>
271     * @param apiBaseUrl base URI for the API
272     * @return ClientBuilder instance
273     */
274    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final URI apiBaseUrl) {
275        return withApiBaseUrl(apiBaseUrl).withErrorMiddleware()
276                .withSerializer(ResponseSerializer.of())
277                .withInternalLoggerFactory((request, topic) -> InternalLogger.getLogger(COMMERCETOOLS + "." + topic))
278                .withUserAgentSupplier(ClientBuilder::buildDefaultUserAgent)
279                .addAcceptGZipMiddleware();
280    }
281
282    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final String apiBaseUrl) {
283        return defaultClient(URI.create(apiBaseUrl));
284    }
285
286    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final String apiBaseUrl, final ClientCredentials credentials,
287            final String tokenEndpoint) {
288        return defaultClient(apiBaseUrl).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
289    }
290
291    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials,
292            final ServiceRegionConfig serviceRegionConfig) {
293        return defaultClient(serviceRegionConfig.getApiUrl()).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials,
294            serviceRegionConfig.getOAuthTokenUrl());
295    }
296
297    /**
298     * @deprecated use {@link #withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials, String)} instead
299     * @param credentials OAuth credentials
300     * @param tokenEndpoint OAuth endpoint
301     * @return client builder
302     */
303    @Deprecated
304    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentials(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
305        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
306    }
307
308    /**
309     * @deprecated use {@link #withClientCredentialsFlow(ClientCredentials, String, VrapHttpClient)} instead
310     * @param credentials OAuth credentials
311     * @param tokenEndpoint OAuth endpoint
312     * @param httpClient HTTP client to be used
313     * @return client builder
314     */
315    @Deprecated
316    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentials(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
317            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
318        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
319    }
320
321    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint) {
322        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString());
323    }
324
325    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint,
326            Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
327        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString(), httpClientSupplier);
328    }
329
330    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint,
331            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
332        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString(), httpClient);
333    }
334
335    private TokenSupplier createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
336            final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
337        return new ClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(),
338            credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
339    }
340
341    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
342        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, oauthHandlerSupplier());
343    }
344
345    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
346            Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
347        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
348            createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClientSupplier.get())));
349    }
350
351    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
352            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
353        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
354            createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient)));
355    }
356
357    public ClientBuilder withStaticTokenFlow(final AuthenticationToken token) {
358        return withTokenSupplier(new StaticTokenSupplier(token));
359    }
360
361    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
362        return withAnonymousSessionFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, oauthHandlerSupplier());
363    }
364
365    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
366            Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
367        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
368            createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClientSupplier.get())));
369    }
370
371    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
372            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
373        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
374            createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient)));
375    }
376
377    private TokenSupplier createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
378            final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
379        return new AnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(),
380            credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
381    }
382
383    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousRefreshFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String anonTokenEndpoint,
384            final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage storage) {
385        return withAnonymousRefreshFlow(credentials, anonTokenEndpoint, refreshTokenEndpoint, storage,
386            oauthHandlerSupplier());
387    }
388
389    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousRefreshFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String anonTokenEndpoint,
390            final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage storage, Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
391        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createAnonymousRefreshFlowSupplier(credentials, anonTokenEndpoint,
392            refreshTokenEndpoint, storage, httpClientSupplier.get()));
393    }
394
395    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousRefreshFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String anonTokenEndpoint,
396            final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage storage, VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
397        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createAnonymousRefreshFlowSupplier(credentials, anonTokenEndpoint,
398            refreshTokenEndpoint, storage, httpClient));
399    }
400
401    private TokenSupplier createInMemoryTokenSupplier(TokenSupplier tokenSupplier) {
402        return Optional.ofNullable(oauthExecutorService)
403                .map(executorService -> new InMemoryTokenSupplier(executorService.get(), tokenSupplier))
404                .orElse(new InMemoryTokenSupplier(tokenSupplier));
405    }
406
407    private TokenSupplier createAnonymousRefreshFlowSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
408            final String anonTokenEndpoint, final String refreshTokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage tokenStorage,
409            final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
410        final RefreshFlowTokenSupplier refreshFlowTokenSupplier = createRefreshFlowSupplier(credentials,
411            refreshTokenEndpoint, tokenStorage, httpClient);
412
413        final AnonymousFlowTokenSupplier anonymousFlowTokenSupplier = new AnonymousFlowTokenSupplier(
414            credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), credentials.getScopes(), anonTokenEndpoint,
415            refreshFlowTokenSupplier, httpClient);
416
417        return new TokenStorageSupplier(tokenStorage, anonymousFlowTokenSupplier);
418    }
419
420    private RefreshFlowTokenSupplier createRefreshFlowSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
421            final String tokenEndpoint, final TokenStorage tokenStorage, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
422        return new RefreshFlowTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), tokenEndpoint,
423            tokenStorage, httpClient);
424    }
425
426    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
427            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint) {
428        return withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint, oauthHandlerSupplier());
429    }
430
431    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
432            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, Supplier<HandlerStack> httpClientSupplier) {
433        return withTokenSupplier(
434            () -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials, email, password,
435                tokenEndpoint, httpClientSupplier.get())));
436    }
437
438    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
439            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
440        return withTokenSupplier(() -> createInMemoryTokenSupplier(
441            createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint, httpClient)));
442    }
443
444    private TokenSupplier createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
445            final String email, final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
446        return new GlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), email,
447            password, credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
448    }
449
450    public ClientBuilder addAcceptGZipMiddleware() {
451        return addMiddleware(AcceptGZipMiddleware.of());
452    }
453
454    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware(final Supplier<ErrorMiddleware> errorMiddleware) {
455        this.errorMiddleware = errorMiddleware;
456        return this;
457    }
458
459    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware() {
460        return withErrorMiddleware(() -> ErrorMiddleware.of(httpExceptionFactory.get()));
461    }
462
463    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware(final ErrorMiddleware errorMiddleware) {
464        return withErrorMiddleware(() -> errorMiddleware);
465    }
466
467    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware(ErrorMiddleware.ExceptionMode exceptionMode) {
468        return withErrorMiddleware(() -> ErrorMiddleware.of(httpExceptionFactory.get(), exceptionMode));
469    }
470
471    public ClientBuilder addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware() {
472        return addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware(NotFoundExceptionMiddleware.of());
473    }
474
475    public ClientBuilder addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware(final Set<ApiHttpMethod> methods) {
476        return addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware(NotFoundExceptionMiddleware.of(methods));
477    }
478
479    public ClientBuilder addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware(final Predicate<ApiHttpRequest> requestPredicate) {
480        return addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware(NotFoundExceptionMiddleware.of(requestPredicate));
481    }
482
483    public ClientBuilder addNotFoundExceptionMiddleware(final NotFoundExceptionMiddleware exceptionMiddleware) {
484        return addMiddleware(exceptionMiddleware);
485    }
486
487    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final Supplier<RetryRequestMiddleware> retryMiddleware) {
488        this.retryMiddleware = retryMiddleware;
489        return this;
490    }
491
492    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final RetryRequestMiddleware retryMiddleware) {
493        return withRetryMiddleware(() -> retryMiddleware);
494    }
495
496    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries) {
497        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries));
498    }
499
500    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, List<Integer> statusCodes) {
501        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, statusCodes));
502    }
503
504    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, List<Integer> statusCodes,
505            final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
506        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, statusCodes, failures));
507    }
508
509    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
510            List<Integer> statusCodes, final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures,
511            final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
512        return withRetryMiddleware(
513            RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
514                    .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes).andThen(fn))));
515    }
516
517    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, final long delay, final long maxDelay,
518            final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
519        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, fn));
520    }
521
522    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries) {
523        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries));
524    }
525
526    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries,
527            List<Integer> statusCodes) {
528        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, statusCodes));
529    }
530
531    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries,
532            List<Integer> statusCodes, final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
533        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, statusCodes, failures));
534    }
535
536    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries,
537            final long delay, final long maxDelay, List<Integer> statusCodes,
538            final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures, final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
539        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay,
540            RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
541                    .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes).andThen(fn))));
542    }
543
544    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries,
545            final long delay, final long maxDelay, final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
546        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, fn));
547    }
548
549    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ScheduledExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries) {
550        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries));
551    }
552
553    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ScheduledExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries,
554            List<Integer> statusCodes) {
555        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, statusCodes));
556    }
557
558    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ScheduledExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries,
559            List<Integer> statusCodes, final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
560        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, statusCodes, failures));
561    }
562
563    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ScheduledExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries,
564            final long delay, final long maxDelay, List<Integer> statusCodes,
565            final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures, final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
566        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay,
567            RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
568                    .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes).andThen(fn))));
569    }
570
571    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final ScheduledExecutorService executorService, final int maxRetries,
572            final long delay, final long maxDelay, final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
573        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, fn));
574    }
575
576    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final Scheduler scheduler, final int maxRetries) {
577        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(scheduler, maxRetries));
578    }
579
580    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final Scheduler scheduler, final int maxRetries,
581            List<Integer> statusCodes) {
582        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(scheduler, maxRetries, statusCodes));
583    }
584
585    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final Scheduler scheduler, final int maxRetries, List<Integer> statusCodes,
586            final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures) {
587        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(scheduler, maxRetries, statusCodes, failures));
588    }
589
590    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final Scheduler scheduler, final int maxRetries, final long delay,
591            final long maxDelay, List<Integer> statusCodes, final List<Class<? extends Throwable>> failures,
592            final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
593        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(scheduler, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay,
594            RetryRequestMiddleware.handleFailures(failures)
595                    .andThen(RetryRequestMiddleware.handleStatusCodes(statusCodes).andThen(fn))));
596    }
597
598    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final Scheduler scheduler, final int maxRetries, final long delay,
599            final long maxDelay, final FailsafeRetryPolicyBuilderOptions fn) {
600        return withRetryMiddleware(RetryRequestMiddleware.of(scheduler, maxRetries, delay, maxDelay, fn));
601    }
602
603    public ClientBuilder withQueueMiddleware(final Supplier<QueueRequestMiddleware> queueMiddleware) {
604        this.queueMiddleware = queueMiddleware;
605        return this;
606    }
607
608    public ClientBuilder withQueueMiddleware(final QueueRequestMiddleware queueMiddleware) {
609        return withQueueMiddleware(() -> queueMiddleware);
610    }
611
612    public ClientBuilder withQueueMiddleware(final int maxRequests, final Duration maxWaitTime) {
613        return withQueueMiddleware(() -> QueueRequestMiddleware.of(maxRequests, maxWaitTime));
614    }
615
616    public ClientBuilder withQueueMiddleware(final Scheduler scheduler, final int maxRequests,
617            final Duration maxWaitTime) {
618        return withQueueMiddleware(() -> QueueRequestMiddleware.of(scheduler, maxRequests, maxWaitTime));
619    }
620
621    public ClientBuilder withQueueMiddleware(final ScheduledExecutorService executorService, final int maxRequests,
622            final Duration maxWaitTime) {
623        return withQueueMiddleware(() -> QueueRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRequests, maxWaitTime));
624    }
625
626    public ClientBuilder withQueueMiddleware(final ExecutorService executorService, final int maxRequests,
627            final Duration maxWaitTime) {
628        return withQueueMiddleware(() -> QueueRequestMiddleware.of(executorService, maxRequests, maxWaitTime));
629    }
630
631    public ClientBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final Supplier<OAuthMiddleware> oAuthMiddleware) {
632        this.oAuthMiddleware = oAuthMiddleware;
633        return this;
634    }
635
636    public ClientBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final OAuthMiddleware oAuthMiddleware) {
637        return withOAuthMiddleware(() -> oAuthMiddleware);
638    }
639
640    public ClientBuilder withTokenSupplier(final Supplier<TokenSupplier> tokenSupplier) {
641        return withOAuthMiddleware(() -> {
642            final OAuthHandler oAuthHandler = new OAuthHandler(tokenSupplier.get());
643            return Optional.ofNullable(oauthExecutorService)
644                    .map(executorService -> OAuthMiddleware.of(executorService.get(), oAuthHandler, authRetries,
645                        useAuthCircuitBreaker))
646                    .orElse(OAuthMiddleware.of(oAuthHandler, authRetries, useAuthCircuitBreaker));
647        });
648    }
649
650    public ClientBuilder withTokenSupplier(final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier) {
651        return withTokenSupplier(() -> tokenSupplier);
652    }
653
654    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerMiddleware(final InternalLoggerMiddleware internalLoggerMiddleware) {
655        this.internalLoggerMiddleware = internalLoggerMiddleware;
656        return this;
657    }
658
659    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerFactory(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory) {
660        return withInternalLoggerMiddleware(InternalLoggerMiddleware.of(internalLoggerFactory));
661    }
662
663    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerFactory(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory,
664            final Level responseLogEvent, final Level deprecationLogEvent) {
665        return withInternalLoggerMiddleware(
666            InternalLoggerMiddleware.of(internalLoggerFactory, responseLogEvent, deprecationLogEvent));
667    }
668
669    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerFactory(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory,
670            final Level responseLogEvent, final Level deprecationLogEvent, final Level defaultExceptionLogEvent,
671            final Map<Class<? extends Throwable>, Level> exceptionLogEvents) {
672        return withInternalLoggerMiddleware(InternalLoggerMiddleware.of(internalLoggerFactory, responseLogEvent,
673            deprecationLogEvent, defaultExceptionLogEvent, exceptionLogEvents));
674    }
675
676    public ClientBuilder withApiBaseUrl(String apiBaseUrl) {
677        return withApiBaseUrl(URI.create(apiBaseUrl));
678    }
679
680    public ClientBuilder withApiBaseUrl(final URI apiBaseUrl) {
681        this.apiBaseUrl = apiBaseUrl;
682        return this;
683    }
684
685    public ClientBuilder withUserAgentSupplier(final Supplier<String> userAgentSupplier) {
686        return withUserAgentMiddleware(new UserAgentMiddleware(userAgentSupplier.get()));
687    }
688
689    private ClientBuilder withUserAgentMiddleware(final UserAgentMiddleware userAgentMiddleware) {
690        this.userAgentMiddleware = userAgentMiddleware;
691        return this;
692    }
693
694    public ClientBuilder addCorrelationIdProvider(final @Nullable CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider,
695            final boolean replace) {
696        if (!replace && correlationIdMiddleware != null) {
697            return this;
698        }
699        if (correlationIdProvider != null) {
700            correlationIdMiddleware = () -> (request, next) -> {
701                if (request.getHeaders().getFirst(ApiHttpHeaders.X_CORRELATION_ID) != null) {
702                    return next.apply(request);
703                }
704                return next.apply(
705                    request.withHeader(ApiHttpHeaders.X_CORRELATION_ID, correlationIdProvider.getCorrelationId()));
706            };
707        }
708        return this;
709    }
710
711    public ClientBuilder addCorrelationIdProvider(final @Nullable CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
712        return addCorrelationIdProvider(correlationIdProvider, true);
713    }
714
715    /**
716     * sets the middlewares to be configured for the client.
717     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
718     * @return ClientBuilder instance
719     */
720    public ClientBuilder withMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
721        this.middlewares = new ArrayList<>(middlewares);
722        return this;
723    }
724
725    /**
726     * sets the middlewares to be configured for the client.
727     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
728     * @return ClientBuilder instance
729     */
730    public ClientBuilder withMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
731        this.middlewares = new ArrayList<>(Collections.singletonList(middleware));
732        if (middlewares.length > 0) {
733            this.middlewares.addAll(Arrays.asList(middlewares));
734        }
735        return this;
736    }
737
738    /**
739     * adds the middlewares to be configured for the client.
740     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
741     * @return ClientBuilder instance
742     */
743    public ClientBuilder addMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
744        this.middlewares.addAll(middlewares);
745        return this;
746    }
747
748    /**
749     * adds the middlewares to be configured for the client.
750     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
751     * @return ClientBuilder instance
752     */
753    public ClientBuilder addMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
754        this.middlewares.add(middleware);
755        if (middlewares.length > 0) {
756            this.middlewares.addAll(Arrays.asList(middlewares));
757        }
758        return this;
759    }
760
761    public ApiHttpClient build() {
762        return ApiHttpClient.of(requireNonNull(apiBaseUrl), requireNonNull(stack.get()),
763            requireNonNull(serializer.get()));
764    }
765
766    public static String buildDefaultUserAgent() {
767        String runtimeVersion = SystemUtils.JAVA_RUNTIME_VERSION;
768        String osName = SystemUtils.OS_NAME;
769        String osArch = SystemUtils.OS_ARCH;
770        String sdkVersion = BuildInfo.VERSION;
771        return userAgent + sdkVersion + " " + " Java/" + runtimeVersion + " (" + osName + "; " + osArch + ")";
772    }
773}
